about.summary: Calculates conditional exact tests (Fisher's exact test, Blaker's exact test, or  exact McNemar's test) and unconditional exact tests (including score-based tests on differences in proportions, ratios of proportions, and odds ratios, and Boshcloo's test) with appropriate matching confidence intervals, and provides power and sample size calculations. Gives melded confidence intervals for the binomial case. Gives boundary-optimized rejection region test (Gabriel, et al, 2018, <DOI:10.1002/sim.7579>), an unconditional exact test for the situation where the controls are all expected to fail.

Calculates conditional exact tests (Fisher's exact test, Blaker's exact test, or  exact McNemar's test) and unconditional exact tests (including score-based tests on differences in proportions, ratios of proportions, and odds ratios, and Boshcloo's test) with appropriate matching confidence intervals, and provides power and sample size calculations. Gives melded confidence intervals for the binomial case. Gives boundary-optimized rejection region test (Gabriel, et al, 2018, <DOI:10.1002/sim.7579>), an unconditional exact test for the situation where the controls are all expected to fail.

name: r-exact2x2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.8" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-exact2x2
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/exact2x2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/exact2x2/exact2x2_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9717933a5baa86b242e1a611860f984f660c089c7b3f765fe14ca582a07b98f1

build:
  noarch: generic
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-exactci
    - r-ssanv
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-exactci
    - r-ssanv

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('exact2x2')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('exact2x2')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=exact2x2
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Calculates conditional exact tests (Fisher's exact test, Blaker's exact test, or  exact McNemar's test) and unconditional exact tests (including score-based tests on differences in proportions, ratios of proportions, and odds ratios, and Boshcloo's test) with appropriate matching confidence intervals, and provides
    power and sample size calculations. Gives melded confidence intervals for the binomial case. Gives boundary-optimized rejection region test (Gabriel, et al, 2018, <DOI:10.1002/sim.7579>), an unconditional exact test for the situation where the controls are all expected to fail.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
